The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H5045>South<s%>. Wherefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Because ye <S%H3988>despise<s%> this <S%H1697>word<s%>, and <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H6233>oppression<s%> and <S%H3868>perverseness<s%>, and rely <S%H8172>thereon<s%>;

And ye shall <S%H2930>defile<s%> the <S%H6826>overlaying<s%> of thy graven <S%H6456>images<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and the <S%H642>plating<s%> of thy molten <S%H4541>images<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>: thou shalt cast them <S%H2219>away<s%> as an unclean <S%H1739>thing<s%>; thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H3318>it<s%>, Get thee hence.
